MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Broughton, Chester, affecting properties in Lansdown Road, Gladstone Road, Coronation Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:28AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:12AM on 25th December 2020
